bibl.title: Letter from Walter Reed to Emilie Lawrence Reed, November 21, 1900

div1.p: Reed is sympathetic to his wife's case of gout. He remarks on a bill to Johnnie Moore for work at the Keewaydin house.

div1.head: Letter from Walter Reed to Emilie Lawrence Reed, November 21, 1900
div1.p:
Your darl-
ing letters of Nov. 15th and
17th both came, this morn-
ing, both being postmarked
Washington Novr 17th - one
at 1.30 a.m. & one 11.30 P.M-
Perhaps the person to whom
you gave them (it may have
been precious joy with
that new silk petticoat')
forgot to mail the one promptly.
I am so sorry to learn
that dearest Miss Room-
fixer has been sick & is
still under the weather from
that abominable gout!
Why, lovie, dear, it means
that you have been living
too high! Miss Greer's Cakes
(wasn't that the name?)
have played “bally hack”
with your sweet gizzard!
No wonder Dr Nash had
to put you on a diet
of mineral water & such
nourishing compounds!
It is a shame nevertheless,
that my darling “oomsey”
has nobody to gently
rub her little “hooffey”
like her Mantee could do,
if he were only there!
Let precious piano-player
of the silk-petticoat try
her gentle fingers at
rubbing - Is your ankle
involved? or is it only
the big-toe? To think of the
sweet lady of Keewaydin
having gout! It does seem
very remarkable. It was
so sweet in mother to get
a nice, new silk-petticoat
for our very good little
daughter, who has studied
so hard, & who is such a
dear, sweet, precious child!
I only wish that I could
have seen her trying it
on. I know that she felt
very proud & looked very
sweet- So glad to hear that
they are fixing that fur-
nace. I'll bet that some
of the pipes in the rear of
the house are obstructed-
It may be, though, that they
are so far from the fur-
nace, that they get no heat-
Johnnies Moore's bill was
alright- I guess the trees
were not hurt- It is
just as warm here now
as it was in July- The
thermometer stands at 84°
as I write, but the breeze is
delightful. Hurry up & get well,
you sweet heart - Love & kisses for
my precious girls-
